Multimedia artist Chance Watt produces works that pulsate with energy. He evokes movement through both form and colour. A figure emerges from the fiery orange and dark amber background in this piece. Her presence, although striking, is almost a suggestion as her features are so delicately modelled. This concept is crucial to Watt's artworks, which toe the line between illusion and reality. Dark purple and mauve strands intertwine across the subject, almost enveloping her. The artist conveys a sense of movement here, his brushstrokes dancing across the canvas. Watt conjures activity in this piece through his choices of colour palette. As analogous colours, the nature of purple and orange is to compliment yet contrast one another. This dynamic between the two colours brings the work to life, stimulating our minds as we endeavour to digest this work.

Hyped Dogs: Custom Gen is here! Customs are hand made by the artist for loyal members of Hyped Dogs GEN1 collection. This is our revolution.

Employee of the Month is a collection that reflects on the topic of the hard, day to day corporate work. The employees are portrayed by the artist, as plain, green smileys, which is a symbol of how the society formed them to be more or less the same. It highlights (sometimes in a funny way) daily struggles, challenges and disappointments of the everyday office life.

Welcome to LittleGhosts Official NFT Collection on Ebisu's Bay! These Ghosts are a collection of skins for your character in our play-to-earn MMO game.

The better the rank, the better the perks in the game and rare custom Ghosts have special abilities in the game. Grab a ghost and get ready to step into the LittleGhosts world!

There are 10,000 ghosts that exist and they are spread out on many blockchains thanks to our NFT bridge.

Welcome to LittleGhosts Official EctoSkeleton NFT Collection on Ebisu's Bay! These EctoSkeletons are a collection of companions to your LittleGhosts in our play-to-earn MMO game.

These EctoSkeletons provide buffs for you Ghosts as you slash your way through dungeons and PvP. There are only 2500 skeletons meaning there is only 1 skeleton for every 4 Ghosts so be sure to grab one to make dungeon delving a little bit easier!

drops.title: Cronies
drops.subtitle: Commemorating the launch of the Cronos network
drops.description:
Cronies are a NFT to commemorate the launch of the Cronos network. Here we will take advantage of the low gas fees on Cronos and produce a randomly generated 100% on-chain SVG with the Cronos logo and the block number in which it was minted.

We are really excited to see the unique collections you will build. Such as, sequential block numbers, block numbers that have a special meaning to you like a birthday, and color schemes. The Cronies minting contract will self destruct after the 1 millionth block validated.

drops.title: Founding Member
drops.subtitle: Early access to features and reduced fees forever.
drops.description:
If you hold a Founding Member NFT you will have access to the NFT launchpad, beta features, and receive the benefit of reduced service fees.

The Founding Member NFT has an on-chain referral system. Refer a friend and receive 5% of the NFT cost and they receive 5% off. Founding Member NFTs will be limited to 10,000.

Eternally grateful for the generosity and luck that had saved his life Ebisu is spreading joy and luck to all he encounters. May his blessing be upon you as a guiding light in your journeys on the Cronos Chain.

drops.subtitle: CROstmas Cards is a collection on Cronos network.
drops.description: CROstmas Cards is a festive collection on Cronos network. You can attach any amount of CRO to your CROstmas card and send it to your friends using the link below, which they will be able to "Unwrap" and get CRO to their wallet.

drops.title: SantaCro
drops.subtitle: SantaCro is a collection of 5555 Santa inspired NFTs with 75+ traits, living on the Cronos chain by crypto.com.
drops.description:
Ho, ho, ho! This year CroMoon is going to host the special Cronos Christmas, and we have a special guest: SantaCro, the Santa of the Cronos chain.
 SantaCro is a collection of 5555 Santa inspired NFTs with 75+ traits, living on the Cronos chain by crypto.com.
 SantaCro is going to bring presents to some lucky minters, on the blockchain AND in real life (yes, you heard that right!).
 LetÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s make this Christmas a special one together!

drops.title: Admiration
drops.subtitle: Deplone is a young visual artist, who turned his life upside down to chase what he really loves. Since he discovered his passion for 3D art and motion design he has developed his own distinct style. Tries to stay humble and anonymous. Works often influenced by the events from his personal life or day-to-day reflections about the world around him.
drops.description: This 6 piece collection was created with an intention to admire certain elements important to the creative process, but also life in general. The aim of every one of these six artworks is to make the new owner just take a small break and ponder about one of those topics, as well as admire their influence on the surrounding world. I chose the form factor of a surreal museum-like space, because ever since I was a small child, I thought about modern art galleries as the calm, quiet places designed to let the observer admire and reflect upon the odd, non-conventional and often controversial concepts. I hope that events taking place in this little space I designed in my head will succeed in their goal.

drops.title: LazyHorse
drops.description: The Lazy Horse Race Club connects the metaverse and real thoroughbred horse racing in a fun and unique club. Each Lazy Horse NFT grants access to the metaverse clubhouse and Lazy Horse Racing Game (drops end of January!), it also connects you to our real racing team. The Club owns, maintains and races horses with profits being shared by the community. All of the club's efforts are most importantly focused on providing a long and sustainable post-racing life for all horses. A large portion of all project proceeds will directly fund equine rescue and retirement, ensuring great lives for these beautiful animals.

drops.title: CROugars
drops.subtitle: A limited collection of 2,222 NFTs with a variety of hand-drawn attributes. Deployed on the Cronos Chain.
drops.description: CROugars is a limited collection of 2,222 NFTs with a variety of hand-drawn attributes. Deployed on the Cronos Chain. This project has a strong focus on real NFT utilities, some of which, Cronos has not yet seen. This includes NFT staking that shares royalties with holders, as well as DAO governance that allows CROugar holders to vote on proposals.

drops.title: Cronos Fox Fraternity
drops.description:
CFF is a 4,444 NFT collection on the Cronos Blockchain. Each NFT was created from over 122 Different Traits, like skin, headgear, body, etc. They are all good looking Bros, but some of them have special perks.

Entering the Fox Fraternity, doesn't just mean possessing a NFT. You will be part of a brotherhood and get exclusive Benefits. This include Giveaways, Airdrops, Gifts, etc.
drops.disclaimer: Smart contract for this project was developed by the Cronos Fox Fraternity team

drops.title: Cronos Goats
drops.description: OG Goats is a limited collection of 1000 NFT's on the Cronos Network. Our Goats main focus is Utility for the community. We will be implementing a buy back feature where half of all the royalties go towards buying the lowest ranked Goats so we can take them off the market for a minimum of 8 years. Our OG Goats will act as a major discount ticket to our second collection of Bad Billy Goats. We will also Gift our community with physical art pieces of their NFT's! The future for these goats are endless as we plan to implement a DEX, NFT staking, P2E games, and Cronos's First NFT art Gallery.

drops.title: Space Crystal Unicorns
drops.subtitle: They are magical! Their strength lies in feeling and finding those in need. All funds raised will be used to support hippotherapy classes for children with disabilities.
drops.description:
Hello everyone, 

I have always had a passion for art which most already know, but what most donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t know is that I am very fond of equestrian sports. Growing up I self-taught to become an equestrian rider. I have also judged equestrian events and competitions and organized charity festivals in support of children with disabilities. 

Riding horses can be very healing for children and their psycho-emotional state and for those who become more involved, assists with muscle development. I used to coach children for free but have retired from this. However, I keep in close contact with the equestrian club in my hometown and occasionally still assist by running the group classes for children. I also financially support and support them with media coverage, assisting with fund raising to help kids receive this amazing and free therapy with horses.

To support the equestrian club and children, I am auctioning a limited-edition 1:1 Ã¢â‚¬ËœRare Heart HodlerÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ NFT. It also comes with a T-shirt and an autographed card from myself. Additionally, 10 holders of the 'Heart Hodler' from the open edition will be randomly selected to receive a physical autographed card from myself

drops.description: The Lazy Horse Race Club connects the metaverse and real thoroughbred horse racing in a fun and unique club. Each Lazy Horse NFT grants access to the metaverse clubhouse and Lazy Horse Racing Game (drops end of January!), it also connects you to our real racing team. The Club owns, maintains and races horses with profits being shared by the community. All of the club's efforts are most importantly focused on providing a long and sustainable post-racing life for all horses. A large portion of all project proceeds will directly fund equine rescue and retirement, ensuring great lives for these beautiful animals.

drops.title: Crognomes
drops.subtitle: 2000 secretive hard working Crognomes living on the cronos blockchain who might share the location of the secret mines if taken care of well enough.
drops.description:
Have you ever wondered where all those shiny crypto cards actually come from?

Those glistening ruby, shiny indigo & luminescent jade crystals that are needed for those ooooh so sweet cashbacks are harvested deep inside the hidden cryptomines. The location of these mines are a well-kept secret by the Crognomes...

While theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re no tattletales, the Crognomes might share the secret location of these Cryptomines with you, if you provide them safe refuge in your cryptowallet.

Crognomes have been known to sneak in their wives, the Crognomides, when theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re feeling lonely. If you mint a route to your wallet after the minting fase of the Crognomes, you can expect these Crognomides to show up in your wallet as well! When you leave them alone for a long enough time, you will find your family of 2 has grown ever larger.

Start your own Crognome-family and adopt your Crognome today!

drops.title: Fractals
drops.subtitle: SeasaltCrisp is a passionate visual artist trying to take you on an adventure with his unique and special artworks.He discovered his love for art already in his early years, but now he's here to share his workon the Cronos Chain as well.
drops.description: This is a limited art collection of 50 unique and original NFTs.This collection was created to explore whole new worlds and surreal scenarios.Let's turn on our imagination and explore art together!

drops.title: Aunah
drops.subtitle:
ThereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s no slowing down anytime soon.

Between his skillfully bold contemplative rendering of abstraction and realism, his paintings are visceral yet sensual.
drops.description:
ThereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s no slowing down anytime soon.

Between his skillfully bold contemplative rendering of abstraction and realism, his paintings are visceral yet sensual.

Each concept is a treat, your mind skips between pops of color to moody-sophistication. Chance creates and energy with hints of density giving off a slight sculptural feel for the eye to play with.

His subjects are elevated to a new age and vibe that will constantly stimulate your mind with ever-changing narratives.

Chance Watt

drops.title: Marie's Cyborgs
drops.subtitle:
Marie's Cyborgs connects fashion and the Metaverse. We invite you to enter Marie's universe by sharing her passions: Fashion, movies and her cyborgs!
The whole team is looking forward to meeting you!
drops.description:
Marie is a French high-potential model.
Convinced that art takes multiple forms, she now wishes to introduce her universe through her collection of NFTs and becoming one of the first model in Metaverse.
The collection will come in 3 classes based on MarieÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s passions: fashion, movies (rare) and her cyborgs (legendary).

drops.title: MAG Brew Vikings
drops.subtitle: MAG is a project involving illustrative art, beer-crafting, and tales inspired by Norse mythology. All accompanied by friendship and conviviality.
drops.description:
Each of the 8000 unique MAG Brew Vikings NFTs is composed of a random selection from 140+ features, hand-drawn by Luigi Zitelli, aka Gigi, a professional illustrator.
Among the collection, you could find the six Magverse gods, legendary characters with custom features related to the lore conceived by our MAG writers. 

The team strongly believes in the unique chance to reduce inequalities and empower people through NFT. 

Charity
We detected a list of charity associations that provides work to the homeless and immigrants. 
After a survey between our community, MAG Brew Vikings will donate 50.000 $ to a chosen no-profit brewery organization. 

Airdrops
Holding NFTs with certain features (i.e., same mirrored backgrounds) will open the collectors a door to exclusive airdrops consisting of unique Gigi masterpieces. After the sold-out, our fellow artist will join the MAG Bard and Minstrel to deliver an illustrated book to all MAG holders: the MAGverse will live forever in the Cronos blockchain! 

An NFT-funding brewery
The completion of our roadmap won't represent a final step but the beginning of a never-seen entity: the first beer firm born and raised from an NFT collection and based on a beer eCommerce that also accepts crypto payments.
NFT holders will have exclusive benefits and economic advantages: profit-sharing (through a staking mechanism), discounts, beer giveaways are only some of the suggestions for attaching a digital asset to real and shared happiness.

drops.title: 0xLuckless
drops.subtitle: Welcome to Project: Emergence. This high-resolution A.I. assisted art project features 8K Ultra HD artwork, a first in the NFT space, using a text prompt guidance system along with a massive array of physical and cloud-based graphics cards to generate one-of-a-kind pieces for your personal enjoyment.
drops.description: Welcome to Project: Emergence. This high-resolution A.I. assisted art project features 8K Ultra HD artwork, a first in the NFT space, using a text prompt guidance system along with a massive array of physical and cloud-based graphics cards to generate one-of-a-kind pieces for your personal enjoyment. This is the genesis project for 0xLuckless, a veteran artist who is somewhat new to the NFT space. Join us on this journey into the mind of man and machine artistry that seeks to breach the bounds of human comprehension and accelerate the evolution of generative art and artistic vision.

drops.title: The LAB: Crazy Scientists
drops.subtitle:
5555 Crazy Scientists has for a long time been in the underground laboratory, they are now ready to move to the cronos blockchain.

Crazy Scientists is a NFT collection packed with utility. The Crazy Scientists will be the central part of the Laboratory's ecosystem. They will have utility in our future launchpad, farms and play to earn game. We will also provide community utility such as airdrops, merch and raffles.
drops.description:
5555 Crazy Scientists has for a long time been in the underground laboratory, they are now ready to move to the cronos blockchain.

Crazy Scientists is a NFT collection packed with utility. The Crazy Scientists will be the central part of the Laboratory's ecosystem. They will have utility in our future launchpad, farms and play to earn game. We will also provide community utility such as airdrops, merch and raffles.

drops.title: Crobots
drops.subtitle: It's quiet now. Humanity has ended. Building their world amongst what was left behind, the Crobots explore, create, and emulate the ancient race that left behind what created them. How were they made? What forces are at work? What secrets will be unearthed?
drops.description:
Meet the Crobots! Ã¢â‚¬â€œ A robotic species created after the extinction of humanity. Algorithmically generated on the Cronos blockchain, the collection features 200+ unique traits meticulously hand-drawn by Pyrilis, a Rubberhose Traditional Artist.

Holders will be granted full commercial rights, allowing the ability to expand the Crobots brand beyond our imagination. Royalties will be strategically allocated into future project enhancements, supporting and building awareness of projects on the Cronos blockchain, and donating to various #crofam supported charities.

After mint, we are excited to embark on the creation and development of multimedia and virtual ecosystem projects, starting with a comic book series. Stay tuned!

The journey has only just begun! https://thecrobots.com/

drops.title: Dodger Dogs
drops.subtitle: "DodgerDogs" are 1,111 unique, 1,105 algorithmically generated, 2 legendary and 4 customized by Barbara characters from 47 hand-drawn traits with different levels of rarity. No two DodgerDogs are exactly alike, and each one of them can be officially owned by a single person on the blockchain.
drops.description:
DodgerDogs is the first PFP project created by Barbara Redekop. 

"DodgerDogs" are 1,111 unique, 1,105 algorithmically generated, 2 legendary and 4 customized by Barbara characters from 47 hand-drawn traits with different levels of rarity. No two DodgerDogs are exactly alike, and each one of them can be officially owned by a single person on the blockchain. 

 Once, on the day when all the traders of the world fainted from the price of bitcoin, Dodger Dog was born. Gifted with unprecedented luck to get out of any troubles and extraordinary spots in honor of his majesty Bitcoin. 

Benefits 
-2 follow-up PFPs airdropped to owners withing 6 months. 
-All royalties will be used to buyback DodgerDogs on the market. 
-Physical gifts (cards, t-shirts etc) will be sent to random DodgerDog owners. (winners will be asked to provide personal information necessary for delivery)

drops.title: BobaNFTea
drops.subtitle: A collection of 3300 NFTeas hand-drawn and deployed on the Cronos chain!
drops.description: The Boba NFTea collection is a community driven project being deployed on the Cronos chain. Holders of the NFTs will gain access to exclusive utilities such as governance and the ability to earn $BOBA tokens, that offers benefits like staking.
drops.priceDescription: 1M LOOT required to be eligible for the Whitelist Price

drops.title: RecklessRobots
drops.subtitle: Reckless Robots is a collection of 2100 unique and detailed hand-drawn NFTs deployed on the Cronos chain.
drops.description: Reckless Robots is a collection of 2100 unique and detailed hand-drawn NFTs deployed on the Cronos chain. Distinctive for this project are the detailed and unique arts, accelerated NFT staking and NFT eliminations (burns). With these eliminations Reckless Robots reduces the total supply by buying the weakest bids from secondary markets and burning the bought NFTs. The burning reduces the total supply and thus reduces the total amount of possible NFTs staked enlarging the percentage of the pool that one NFT holds.
drops.priceDescription: 8M LOOT required to be eligible for the Whitelist Price

drops.title: The HD: Hyped Dogs
drops.subtitle: Hyped Dogs GEN1 is a collection of 3000 uniquely generated NFTs stored on the Cronos Chain. Each Hyped Dog NFT is generated with over 120 + attributes with different rarities.
drops.description: Hyped Dogs is a collection of 3000 uniquely generated NFTs stored on the Cronos Chain. Each Hyped Dog NFT is generated with over 120 + attributes with different rarities. Being a Hyped Dog member goes beyond owning an awesome dog art, it's your pass to a exclusive brotherhood with many benefits. Hyped Dogs is here with the goal to merge physical world and crypto world. We are here and we are HYPED! Come join us!

drops.title: Creatures
drops.subtitle: A COLLECTION OF CREATURES THAT UNLOCK AN IMMERSIVE MUSIC & METAVERSE EXPERIENCE
drops.description: Creatures by Cult Leader is a 9,999 generative PFP project that unlocks an immersive music & metaverse experience. Before the initial drop, the teams focus has been building community, creating strategic partnerships, and developing the metaverse to deliver high value and a successful start for the creature community.

drops.title: Crognomides - Route to your wallet
drops.subtitle: 2000 secretive Crognomides on their way to their lovely Crognomes. Mint a route to your wallet to make sure the Crognomide finds her way to yours so she can be re-united with her husband.
drops.description:
Have you ever wondered where all those shiny crypto cards actually come from? Those glistening ruby, shiny indigo & luminescent jade crystals that are needed for those ooooh so sweet cashbacks are harvested deep inside the hidden cryptomines. 

The location of these mines are a well-kept secret by the Crognomes... While they're no tattletales, the Crognomes might share the secret location of these Cryptomines with you, if you provide them safe refuge in your cryptowallet. 

Crognomes have been known to sneak in their wives, the Crognomides, when they're feeling lonely. If you mint a route to your wallet, you can expect these Crognomides to show up in your wallet as well! 

When you leave them alone for a long enough time, you will find your family of 2 has grown ever larger.

The Crognomides are currently only available to the HOLDERS of Crognomes #1,409 - #2,000 for a price of 50 CRO. Snapshot to determine holders will be taken 24hrs before launch (exact time TBA).
drops.disclaimer: Only whitelisted addresses are eligible for this mint. Please check the Crognomes discord for more information.

drops.title: Meta Cyborgs
drops.description: The Meta Cyborgs A collection of 10 000 uniquely generated NFTs to boost the yields of your farms on CyborgSwap Dex. The first collection resulting from the acquisition of ChronoSwap by Marie's Cyborgs NFTs.The Meta Cyborgs A collection of 10,000 uniquely generated NFTs to boost the APR yields of your farms on CyborgSwap Dex. This collection will unlock several features over time and will also be stakable after mint starts to earn CNFT. It's the Founding Member collection of CyborgSwap and will be used in all our next NFT features and development.

drops.title: Cronos ALIENFT
drops.subtitle: A limited collection of 2500 NFTs with a variety of hand-drawn attributes with a unique design sure to please all life forms. Offering forms of utility like royalty sharing that will reward the user upon staking their NFTS on Crodex
drops.description: From far off unquantifiable depths of our universe these brilliant extraterrestrial life forms live in harmonyâ€¦ until recently they have caught solar wind of what the humans of earth have been doing with these â€œNFTsâ€ so they want inâ€¦ will you take the small step for man and create the big change for mankind! Our unique utility of NFT staking will allow users to earn a from of passive rewards in this case CRO from staking their NFTs, the rewards are gathered from 100% of all secondary market sales at an 8% royalty fee.

drops.title: Cronos Gorilla Business
drops.subtitle: Cronos Gorilla Business is a collection of 6100 uniquely generated NFTs stored on the Cronos Chain. Each CGB NFT is based on 10+ attributes with different rarities. The collection is composed of 4 different factions: MAFIA / AQUA / IGNIS / TERRA. So make the right choice.
drops.description:
Cronos Gorilla Business is a collection of 6100 uniquely generated NFTs stored on the Cronos Chain. Each CGB NFT is based on 10+ attributes with different rarities. The collection is composed of 4 different factions: MAFIA / AQUA / IGNIS / TERRA. So make the right choice.
These NFTs can then be staked on our site within the next few weeks to earn $CPB tokens and several other features that will be announced.
drops.disclaimer: Presale is limited to whitelisted addresses only. Please check the Cronos Primate Business discord for more information.

drops.title: Crosmocrafts Parts
drops.subtitle:
These spaceship-parts are needed to build a Crosmocraft! 
Parts come in 3 types: Engines, Boosters and Space Decks. Types are further divided into classes: Regular, rare and legendary. There are a total of 9 possibilities and your parts have to be of the same class to be able to build a spaceship!
drops.description: Spaceship-parts are needed to build your very own Crosmocraft! When minting parts you will randomly receive one of the three distinct parts that are needed for a Crosmocraft. These are a Booster, an Engine and a Space Deck. All parts will come in either a Regular, Great or Legendary rarity. The rarity of the parts will directly influence the rarity of the Crosmocraft and its traits!

drops.title: Lolita & Friends
drops.subtitle: Lolita & Friends is the first-ever petfluencer NFT collection. This project is launched by @LolitatheAlien, a Chihuahua petfluencers with a community of 200k people on Instagram. The collection consists of 2,500 randomly assembled Lolitas with over 120 traits!
drops.description: Lolita & Friends mission is to rescue endangered and abandoned animals. Our first mission is to rescue 1000 dogs from the streets: feeding, vaccinating, sterilizing and all other cares to prepare them for adoption. In this collection, Lolita has a variety of outfits, accessories, faces and background colors. Some NFTs are rare, some are very rare, and some are exceptional! Our goal is to onboard worldwide influencer pets of Instagram through beautiful NFT collections with utility. Be part of the original collection and join our mission to save thousands of abandoned animals!

drops.title: Gold Partner
drops.subtitle: Gold Partner Collection - The Hall of Fame is a collection of 300- 3D animated NFT's with unique features and utilities. Every NFT is a VIP founding members pass on our project. Holders of these NFT's will enjoy 30% share of the primary profits earned from all upcoming collections, marketplace and other benefits from time to time. These NFT's offer a profit-sharing partnership opportunity to the buyers and holders to earn passive income by staking these NFTs.
drops.description:
Gold Partner Collection - The Hall of Fame is designed to offer direct profit-sharing partnership for all holders of these NFTs.
Long term goal of this project is to create a decentralized marketplace for trading real-world collectibles (not just pictures). This will allow P2P trading of real-world collectables on the blockchain.
Unique Utilities:
â€¢    30% of primary profits are shared directly among the holders of this collection.
â€¢    Exclusive giveaways for the gold partners.
â€¢    Exclusive access to DAO- This will give all holders the power to cast their vote towards proposals put forward by the team, along with community proposals for roadmap ideas and utility.
â€¢    Chance to be a Platinum partner and enjoy a bigger chunk of profits.
â€¢    Come explore the joy of owning a share in NFT project and become a founding member!

drops.title: Cronos Fighters
drops.subtitle:
We fall. We break. We fail. BUT THEN. We rise. We heal. We Overcome. We all have a fighter in us - Mint yours today. 
Fighters are FINALLY Here!
drops.description: Cronos Fighters is a generative collection of 1000 Female and Male Champions. A fighter's purpose is to inspire and motivate, no matter the situation. This is the first piece of the Fighters game and metaverse. Each V1 fighter will give its owner many perks, such as, token airdrops, game upgrades, voting rights and more! Our goal is to add value to our holders while creating the greatest world the Cronos chain has ever seen! Fighters Are Here!

drops.title: Big Bad Wolves
drops.subtitle:
Big Bad Wolves is a community based NFT project including real time video game, metaverse integration and big marketing campaign.
Holding the NFT gives you a PRIVILEGED position.
Welcome to THE PACK!
drops.description:
BIG BAD WOLVES is a community NFT collection heading towards a gory multiplayer video game and metaverse integration. Join the ride and access staking, giveaways, airdrops, and rewarded Art & Memes contests!

Holder WILL be rewarded.

1/1 are unique and exclusive artworks made by several artists.

All NFTs in the collection have random stats for strength, agility, stamina, speed and ferocity. These stats will change the way to play the video game.

drops.title: NoBuddies NFT Gen 2
drops.subtitle: NoBuddies NFT Gen 2 is a collection of 2250 uniquely generated NFTs on the Cronos Chain with over 100 attributes.
drops.description: NoBuddies is a project created with one thing in mind, and that was to give back. We plan on giving back 45,000 CRO to holders through the mint. 200 CRO will be raffled every 10 mints. At  the end end of the mint we will raffle remaining 5,000 CRO split between 5 winners. Total 50,000 CRO given back to holders. Staking is already live on Crodex, so mint and immediately stake your NoBuddies. We have also made the 1st mobile game to feature Cronos NFTs on Apple and Android and plan to create a full collection of free mobile games.

drops.title: MarbleVerse
drops.subtitle: Find your favorite marble and try to become the rolling champion of the MarbleVerse
drops.description:
MarbleVerse will be the 1st P2E NFT game on Cronos Network and welcomes all into an evolving universe where your marbles race to prove their worth and become more valuable racers. Mint your marbles and let it race for you; as it wins races, you will earn too.

Anyone holding Marble NFTs will be able to join marble races and earn valuable rewards based on their marbles success.

MarbleVerse brings a game where you can enjoy racing, winning, earning and owning beautiful pieces of art with the rest of the community.
drops.priceDescription: Mint prices increases by 10 CRO for every 2000 nfts minted

drops.title: LHRC Skybox
drops.subtitle: Full access and control of a private skybox room in the Lazy Horse Metaverse
drops.description: The LHRC Skybox is a property asset inside the Lazy Horse Metaverse represented by the LHRC Skybox NFT.  The LHRC Skybox gives each owner full access and control of their own room, 20 sellable seats to every Signature Concert Event, a virtual meeting/conference room for private events, a view of ongoing races in the Lazy Horse Race Game, customizable and licensable wall pictures, and 24/7 access to all the entertainment the Lazy Horse Metaverse has to offer.
drops.priceDescription: Whitelist-only presale for the first 12 hours (limit 1 per address). Public sale after presale ends (limit 3 per transaction).

drops.title: CronosVerse
drops.subtitle: Buy your digital land plot, develop your property & enter The CronosVerse!
drops.description:
The CronosVerse aims to be the first metaverse social MMO on the Cronos Chain.

Land owners will be able to build structures on their land for their NFT characters, friends, and community members to enjoy. Build using preloaded building materials with absolutely no coding required.

Types of Lands:

Plains Tiles- Allows for building of rustic style structures (max amalgamation of 16 tiles)

Suburban Tiles- Allows for suburban style structures (max amalgamation of 4 tiles)

Commercial Tiles- Allows for retail, office, entertainment and other commercial structures (max amalgamation of 4 tiles)
drops.priceDescription: Presale is for whitelisted addresses only and limited to 4 tiles per address. Public sale is limited to 16 Plains, 4 Suburban, and 4 Commercial.

drops.title: Cro Succubus
drops.subtitle: A succubus is 2666 NFT collection, a demon in female form that will forever live on Cronos Smartchain. We are just starting to unleash Hell on cronos. "Keep your mind awake, because your soul I might take."
drops.description:
A succubus is 2666 NFT collection, a demon in female form that will forever live on Cronos Smartchain. We are just starting to unleash Hell on cronos. Come join us on this delicious dream and vision for the NFT world. 
Enjoy all membership perks of Hyped NFT Club, future staking utility and more!
"Keep your mind awake, because your soul I might take."

drops.title: Crobees
drops.subtitle: Jump into the hive and discover the beautiful universe around the bees. With more than 110 attributes, all these unique NFTs was drawn with love and high design quality!
drops.description:
The Crobees - A 2222 NFTs collection of bees with more than 110 attributes. The crobees is putting forward a project where the community is in the heart of it. With the mindset to build a hive in the cronos chain, to gather people from all background (DeFi, NFTs...) into a huge family. 

Holding a NFT gives you some premium access as the DAO/Staking/Queen's Lottery/BeeShop. The DAO gives you the power to choose the future of the project, to take part in the decisions by vote (already live in Discord).

The staking of your Crobees NFTs generates our own token, which opens the doors of the BeeShop.With this token, you can buy WL/Airdrops/Merchandise/Charity Vouchers/Queen's Lottery Tickets. Visit our website or medium to check the entire Roadmap.

Join the Hive right now and let's build it!

drops.title: Cyborg Brotherhood
drops.subtitle: For as long as my forefathers can remember my family has been part of the Brotherhood. We are faithful servants of the last noble cause, we have put our skill of arms at the service of justice, of our justice. In a world where good and evil only have differences if the forbiddens ones dare to speaks them, we secretly and faithfully maintained the balance.
drops.description:
Join the Cyborg Brotherhood and become an Assassin

- 10% of the mint sale of the Cyborg Brotherhood divided among Assassins and all future MC projects
- 10% on the first mint of all the projects we will help to launch through our incubator
- Increased decision-making power on all MC decisions (real DAO)
drops.priceDescription: WL price only valid for up to 3 per whitelisted address

drops.title: Kardia
drops.subtitle: Kardia is a unique multi-tier gaming NFT project on the KCC and CRO blockchain, starting with the founder's deck of 50,000 playable cards. Using our play-to-earn mechanics, you can play against other players, earn valuable resources, win NFTs, and compete for crypto-related prizes. A crypto-currency prize pool will be generated from secondary sale royalties and will be used to buy NFTs, other cryptocurrencies, and other prizes that can be won as a result of tournaments, special triggers, loot boxes, and more!
drops.description: The Founder's Deck (CRO) consists of 6010 playing cards, each of them uniquely serialized. Each card grants the owner a certain number of Golden Acorns (in-game currency) based on the rarity of the card. These Golden Acorns can be used for various means on PlayKardia, including opening Loot Boxes for cryptocurrency prizes, additional NFTs, and more!

drops.title: Monkey Of Anarkey
drops.subtitle:
The MoA universe will give you access to a unique collection of 1999 NFTs monkeys, darker and more badass than ever. 
Each NFT is unique and composed of different attributes that make it belong to one of the 4 sections, each with its own perks. 
 So don't waste any more time, come and join us if you want to be part of the MoA fam!
drops.description:
"We accepted to be separated from our families and to be put in cages, to be treated as less than nothing.... Then everything changed on May 28, 2016 and the world will now never be the same." 
Monkey Of Anarkey is a gang of biker monkeys determined to get revenge after centuries of abuse. The MoA universe will give you access to a unique collection of 1999 NFTs monkeys, darker and more badass than ever. 
 The MoA NFT collection is divided into 4 sections:

CREW MONKEYS
SICARIO MONKEYS
TREASURER MONKEYS
PRESIDENT MONKEYS

Each NFT is unique and composed of different attributes that make it belong to one of the 4 sections, each with its own perks. 
Sharing 3% of the total turnover of the first sale, decisions on how to use Ebisu's Bay royalties, NFT staking and many other things. This is what awaits you if you decide to join the MoA fam!

drops.title: CroClubs
drops.subtitle: Go gear up CroClubbers! There is an epic journey ahead of you. Meet the vicious creatures of the night, have your characters from the Werewolf Club and be a part of the story!
drops.description:
The CroClubs Werewolf Club is the very first collection in the CroClubs ecosystem. A limited collection of 1500 pieces, where each NFT of the Werewolf Club is generated from over 350 hand-drawn traits.

CroClubs will be a wide ecosystem that consisting of 1) at least 4 NFT collections to be the main characters of the play-to-earn turn-based combat game, 2) a lore that tells the story of our world, and 3) and a financial ecosystem that will be backed first by CRO and later by the main utility token.

Being a holder of a CroClubs Werewolf NFT will grant access to a huge staking pool and the game, which will feature in-game rewards. By becoming a CroClubs holder, you may get real-life prizes such as exclusive CDC and Cronos NFTs, VR Headsets, airdrops, merchandises and custom avatars.

Become a CroClubber and join the adventure!

drops.title: Employee of the Month
drops.subtitle: Employee of the Month is a collection that reflects on the topic of the hard, day to day corporate work in a humoristic manner.
drops.description: Employee of the Month is a collection that reflects on the topic of the hard, day to day corporate work. The employees are portrayed by the artist, as plain, green smileys, which is a symbol of how the society formed them to be more or less the same. It highlights (sometimes in a funny way) daily struggles, challenges and disappointments of the everyday office life.

auctions.title: Horse 1
auctions.description: The Lazy Horse Race Club will be supporting SaddleUp!, a charity based out of Nashville, TN. Specifically, proceeds will be donated to the Lauren and Charlotte Uribe Pony Fund. This fund's purpose is to provide 10 therapy horses to help replenish SaddleUp!'s therapy herd, helping to provide thousands of additional therapy sessions for children and adults with intellectual or developmental disabilities.

auctions.title: Horse 2
auctions.description: The Lazy Horse Race Club will be supporting SaddleUp!, a charity based out of Nashville, TN. Specifically, proceeds will be donated to the Lauren and Charlotte Uribe Pony Fund. This fund's purpose is to provide 10 therapy horses to help replenish SaddleUp!'s therapy herd, helping to provide thousands of additional therapy sessions for children and adults with intellectual or developmental disabilities.

auctions.title: Croskull 1
auctions.description: The CroSkull team will be supporting Cancer Research UK, a charity within England and Wales. Proceeds will be donated and used to provide labs with research chemicals, continue operation of mobile awareness units to provide early diagnosis to visitors, provide free cancer clinical trials to those in need, tools for advanced DNA sequencing, and chat support for those emotionally affected by their own or a loved one's diagnosis and treatment.

auctions.title: Croskull 2
auctions.description: The CroSkull team will be supporting Cancer Research UK, a charity within England and Wales. Proceeds will be donated and used to provide labs with research chemicals, continue operation of mobile awareness units to provide early diagnosis to visitors, provide free cancer clinical trials to those in need, tools for advanced DNA sequencing, and chat support for those emotionally affected by their own or a loved one's diagnosis and treatment.

auctions.title: Chimps
auctions.description: The Cronos Chimp Club will be supporting the Jane Goodall Institute, a charity who protects chimpanzees and inspires people to conserve the natural world we all share. Our donation will go towards seeing our fellow chimps are looked after, healthy and living a wonderful life. JGI also works towards improving the health of women and education of girls; cultivating local livelihoods in harmony with nature; and helping young people become the informed generation of conservation leaders.

auctions.title: Space Crystal Unicorns
auctions.description:
Hello everyone, 

I have always had a passion for art which most already know, but what most donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t know is that I am very fond of equestrian sports. Growing up I self-taught to become an equestrian rider. I have also judged equestrian events and competitions and organized charity festivals in support of children with disabilities. 

Riding horses can be very healing for children and their psycho-emotional state and for those who become more involved, assists with muscle development. I used to coach children for free but have retired from this. However, I keep in close contact with the equestrian club in my hometown and occasionally still assist by running the group classes for children. I also financially support and support them with media coverage, assisting with fund raising to help kids receive this amazing and free therapy with horses.

To support the equestrian club and children, I am auctioning a limited-edition 1:1 Ã¢â‚¬ËœRare Heart HodlerÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ NFT. It also comes with a T-shirt and an autographed card from myself. Additionally, 10 holders of the 'Heart Hodler' from the open edition will be randomly selected to receive a physical autographed card from myself
